Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.2.0-12, affected by CVE-2024-45338
